title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £27,000 stay in a stately home
text: For seven incredible days indulge in the unsurpassed luxury of the glorious Stanbrook Abbey ( StanbrookAbbey.com ), located in the heart of the beautiful Worcestershire countryside. Spend a week with nine of your nearest and dearest as you revel in award-winning cuisine and exquisite private dining experiences, including pre-dinner beverages in the fabulous George’s Bar each day. Enjoy the Abbey Trail Segway Experience, a fascinating historic tour, an insightful wine pairing dinner and retire to luxurious accommodation in the incredible Manor House each night. Worth more than £27,000, this incredible prize will leave you with memories to treasure for a lifetime. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The prize Comfortably nestled between the Cotswolds and the Vale of Evesham in an area of outstanding natural beauty, Stanbrook Abbey is a former Benedictine monastery set within 26 magnificent acres. This Grade II listed wonder has an array of iconic features and a calm tranquility that sweeps over every guest that visits. Boasting Pugin designed architecture, this stunning hotel has recently undergone a £5 million refurbishment and now boasts 56 glorious bedrooms, a luxurious new bar, innovative games rooms and an extended reception and welcome area. The culinary offerings at Stanbrook Abbey are just as inspiring as their surroundings, so you can expect the freshest, locally sourced ingredients carefully chosen to create spectacular dishes and an unrivalled dining experience. As well as full dining each day, including fine wine in the evening, this incredible prize also features private dining experiences in the beautiful Bistro and the unique Wine Cellar. With an array of exciting activities, fantastic facilities and a wonderfully peaceful setting, Stanbrook Abbey provides an oasis of calm perfect for when you need to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The prize provider In a world crowded with standard hotels, AmaZing Venues break the mould in believing that only exceptional is good enough. Think unique locations, stunning properties and first class staff dedicated to making your stay one that you will treasure for a lifetime. From a French inspired Chateau in Wales, an inspiring former abbey to historic sea forts just off the coast of Portsmouth, guests can expect awe inspiring surroundings, breath-taking views and memories to last a lifetime. Each hotel is architecturally magnificent and has undergone sympathetic restoration, carefully ensuring that the unique atmosphere and history of each is gently maintained for future generations to cherish. Whether it be your wedding, a landmark birthday, a special treat, or an important business function, these astounding properties are perfect for when only exceptional is good enough.
